title: A thing I would like to see added into the game.
body:
The ability to control which champions I can see when I am picking champions so instead of all of them I could just see the few that I actually play.

The search feature could be used to search for champions I own but can't see otherwise so that I could do trades and whatnot, but sometimes seeing every champion overwhelms me in champ select and I cant think of a champion I can play in my situation with any capacity.

replies.body:
Are you saying that you could 'rate' champions as ones you want to play, and then they would show up at the top of your champion select list?
 If that's what you're talking about, I agree. I'm new to league, so I don't have too many champs, but it's still a nightmare to find my favorites during draft.

I believe you can do that, if you type "Champion name | Champion name | Champion name | etc" in the search bar
You could make a list and put in a notepad  file and every time in champ select you type it in the search bar
I will have to try that

Heroes of the Storm has that; you can select which Heroes are your favorites to a maximum of ten and they'll have a heart placed by their portrait in character select, even filtering them out among all the other Heroes with a click. If you want to, you can even have it so you get a random Hero from your favorites list when going into a match.
